page.title: 20CLUBS
page.content: Clubs Blackhead The area is not large or central enough to support groups of its own.Individuals travel out to clubs and associations. The Womens Institute in Coverack has been suspended. There is a craftclub in Coverack. Two children belong to the "On Target" youth group run by St.Peters Church in Coverack and the Guides. This report has been prepared by St.Keverne Womens Institute and by St.Keverne Local History Society. Both incomers and natives enjoy and contribute to clubs and life generally. There is a varied and tolerant social mix. People have room to grow.
